propositions.text: The story revolves around the relationship between the female protagonist and the National Teacher in a female-dominated society.
The protagonist encounters the National Teacher unexpectedly and feels both curiosity and pressure.
The protagonist is selected to serve in the National Teacher's mansion, marking a turning point in her life.
Political intrigue and power struggles surround the National Teacher, involving the protagonist indirectly.
A complex emotional bond develops between the protagonist and the National Teacher over time.
The story culminates in shared challenges, loyalty, and an unfulfilled emotional connection due to societal constraints.

concepts.name: National Teacher
concepts.context: A powerful, mysterious female figure of authority in a female-dominated society.

concepts.name: Female Protagonist
concepts.context: The central character who transitions from an ordinary life to serving the National Teacher.

concepts.name: Power Struggle
concepts.context: Political intrigue and conspiracies within the court and mansion.

concepts.name: Emotional Bond
concepts.context: The evolving relationship between the protagonist and the National Teacher.

concepts.name: Female-Dominated Society
concepts.context: The societal structure where women hold primary power.

hierarchy.structure: The document is structured as a narrative with ten chapters, progressing from an initial encounter to a deepening relationship amidst political and personal challenges, culminating in a bittersweet resolution.
